Dear LegalZoom Customer,
Thank you for choosing your free 30-day trial of Google Apps for Business. The suite of online apps can help you run your business and improve productivity.
Here’s what’s included:
• Gmail for business – Get custom email addresses (@your_company.com), more storage, and access from anywhere—on the web, on your phone, and even offline.
• Google Calendar – Centralize schedules in one company-wide calendar that's accessible from anywhere. Overlay calendars to see when people are available, send invites, and plan events.
• Google Docs – Share and collaborate on documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and forms. Employees always have access to the most up-to-date versions of their work files from anywhere.
• Google Sites – Centralize important company information and manage projects with an internal website that will help keep your team organized and connected.
Simply fill out the form to create your account. You don’t need a credit card. After your 30-day free trial, you can choose to continue for only $5 per month.
Follow this link to get started: https://www.google.com/a/cpanel/premier/new3?hl=en
Best Regards,
LegalZoom Team
